m_szDocTitle: Tesla Model S Is Safest Car Ever Tested, Sets New Safety Records (Tesla Releases More Info) | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Model S Is Safest Car Ever Tested, Sets New Safety Records (Tesla Releases More Info) August 20th, 2013 by Zachary Shahan   We already reported that the Tesla Model S has received a 5-star safety rating from NHTSA . With the recent  Model S crash that knowcked out a power grid , it’s timely that Tesla has just release more details on the 5-star safety rating. Notably, the Model S has set a new NHTSA safety record. The details on why are quite interesting. Here they are via Tesla (also available on the Tesla website ): Tesla Model S Achieves Best Safety Rating Of Any Car Ever Tested Palo
